title: ICC T20 World Cup 2026: Check Full Schedule, Teams, Groups Venues And Dates | Cricket News - News18
text: ICC T20 World Cup 2026: Check Full Schedule, Teams, Groups Venues And Dates ICC T20 World Cup Full Schedule: The 20-team competition will be held across venues in India and Sri Lanka over a four-week window. The 10th edition of the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup is scheduled to be held from February 7 to March 8. India and Sri Lanka will co-host the biannual competition. Having won the prized silverware in 2024, India enters the latest edition as defending champions. Suryakumar Yadav & Co. will be joined in the party by former winners West Indies, England, Australia, Pakistan and Sri Lanka. Recommended Stories - Sinhalese Sports Club in Sri Lanka gets floodlights ahead of T20 World Cup - PAK Boycott Means Little To India, Focus Remains Performance & Security: Top Govt. Sources - Michael Vaughan Picks T20 World Cup Semifinalists: 'India, England, New Zealand &...' - T20WC Warm-Up: Zimbabwe, Oman, Nepal win their respective games Fellow ICC full members South Africa, New Zealand, Afghanistan, Zimbabwe and Ireland will also be vying for the top honours, while leading associate teams USA, Namibia, Netherlands, Oman, Italy, Scotland, Nepal, UAE and Canada will also strive to make their presence felt. These 20 participants have been divided into four groups of five teams each to determine the qualifiers for the Super 8s stage. India, Pakistan, USA, Namibia and the Netherlands are part of Group A, while Australia, Sri Lanka, Oman, Ireland and Zimbabwe make up Group B. Group C features West Indies, England, Scotland, Italy and Nepal and Group D has South Africa, New Zealand, Afghanistan, Canada and UAE. Teams will play their respective group rivals once in the initial stage before the top 2 sides from all four groups qualify for the Super 8s. The Super 8 qualifiers will be further divided into two groups of four teams each, where teams play 3 games apiece. The top 2 sides from either group will advance to the semi-finals. Kolkata, Mumbai, Delhi, Ahmedabad and Chennai will play host to matches of the Indian leg. In Sri Lanka, Colombo and Pallekele have been allocated the games. Full schedule for the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2026 Group Stage Saturday, February 7 - Netherlands vs Pakistan at 11am (05:30 GMT) – SSC, Colombo - Scotland vs West Indies at 3pm (09:30 GMT) – Eden Gardens, Kolkata - India vs USA at 7pm (13:30 GMT) – Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai Sunday, February 8 - Afghanistan vs New Zealand at 11am (05:30 GMT) – MA Chidambaram Stadium, Chennai - England vs Nepal at 3pm (09:30 GMT) – Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai -
